headline: Is T. Rowe Price A Long Term Opportunity After Recent Price Weakness?
summary: Wondering if T. Rowe Price Group is quietly turning into a value opportunity while everyone chases flashier names? In this article, we walk through whether the current price really reflects its long term fundamentals. The stock closed at $103.28 recently. While it is down 1.5% over the last week and 8.9% year to date, it has still managed a 7.0% gain over three years, showing a bumpy but resilient longer term path. Recent moves have come as investors reassess traditional asset managers in...
